Review   

You are certified to transport ammunition, but you don’t have a car.

A senior cadet with a driver’s licence can use their parent’s car.

Can you ride as a passenger and transport ammunition to a CCO activity this way?

This is allowed by law and policy, however, it is not recommended due to the increased level of risk associated with a young driver, and the complications associated with whether the parents give informed consent for the transportation of the ammunition in their car.
